findMaximalUnrelatedSet

List findMaximalUnrelatedSet(java.lang.String sampleId)
Find the largest possible set of samples that are unrelated to the given sample
Returns:

fromSingletons

static Pedigrees fromSingletons(List sampleIds)
A convenience method that creates a set of pedigrees from set of unrelated singletons. Such a pedigree is not very useful, but it allows code expecting a pedigree to work with unrelated samples.
